short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark Search is an AI-powered Chrome extension that helps you quickly find your bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmark Search is a powerful AI-driven Chrome extension designed to help users quickly find their bookmarks. This tool not only provides intelligent search functionality but also features a user-friendly interface and high-performance efficiency. Let's take a look at its main features and how to use it:

Key Features:

Smart Semantic Search: Use natural language queries to find bookmarks, even if you don't remember the exact title. This feature greatly enhances the flexibility and accuracy of searches.

Fast and Efficient: Quickly search through large numbers of bookmarks without performance issues. No matter how many bookmarks you have, Bookmark Search maintains high-speed performance.

User-Friendly: The intuitive interface makes bookmark searching easy. Even users who are not tech-savvy can easily get started.

Dual Search Modes: Offers both regular keyword search and semantic search modes, catering to different search needs.

How to Use:

Set up AI Provider:

In Settings, choose your AI Provider.
You can select either Jina AI or OpenAI as your AI service provider.
Configure API:

Set up your API key.
Optionally, set a base URL (if required).
Create Bookmark Index:

Click the "Add to Index" button.
This will add your bookmarks to the search index, allowing the AI to analyze and retrieve them.
Start Searching:

In the search page, enter what you're looking for in the search box.
Regular Search will display results based on keyword matching.
Semantic Search will show results based on AI-powered semantic understanding.
With Bookmark Search, you can say goodbye to endless scrolling through your bookmark list. No matter how many bookmarks you have, you can easily and quickly find the web pages you need. This extension is particularly useful for those who frequently use bookmarks or need to quickly find specific information among a large number of saved web pages.

By combining traditional keyword search with advanced AI-driven semantic search, Bookmark Search provides users with a comprehensive and powerful bookmark management solution. It not only improves work efficiency but also enhances the overall browsing experience.
